author: CBS News
title: Nursing home presuming all 800 patients, staff have COVID-19
description: Facility outside Pittsburgh says 52 patients and staff have tested positive and three patients have died
content:
Beaver County, Pennsylvania — A Beaver County nursing home is operating under the presumption that all of its 800 patients and staff members have COVID-19, reports CBS Pittsburgh.
The Brighton Rehabiliation & Wellness Center, northwest of the city, says … [+616 chars]
